title: Vel'Koz has become engrossed with anal...
body: Vel'Koz has become engrossed with analysing Poros, and will be disabled for the Poro King featured game mode. He thanks them for their contribution.

replies.body: well he is called "the hentai monster" for a reason.....

Show me where.

"vel'koz has become engrossed with anal.."

*sniff*..... there's just so much beauty in the world.

D:

Well... I guess beauty is in the nose of the beholder, then.

Seeing as how the Beholder in question has no nose ({{champion:161}}), though...

Anybody else see the thread title on the front page as "Vel'Koz has become engrossed with anal..."

I had to click this thread.
That's the only reason anyone clicked this.
http://img.pandawhale.com/51394-George-Takei-oh-my-gif-fXlS.gif
So does anyone know what the actual bug is?

He was probing tossed poros in mid flight. Resulting with graphic glitches - blue poro insides everywhere! 


Very horrific.
I don't know, but it probably has something to do with his channelled ultimate.
he is making horrible blue buggy flashes everywhere. and you can't even see his abilities
It's definitely this. Though I could see his skill shots.... But in my experience with the bug, it was his Q causing the screen to flash blue.

His ult was not working on that map. You'd press R and it wouldn't let him ult.
He may just be too strong because of his AOE.
